entry.source: It is I, Abbot Hugo, leader of the Monastery.{F801}Many of the relics require "electricity" in{F801}order to function. To connect these relics{F801}to an energy source, we need a different{F801}relic, known as a {F804,5}power cable.{F804,0} I am sure{F801}you can find one in Tokyo somewhere.{F801}
